title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Join India's leading IT services company as a software engineering intern. Work on cutting-edge projects using Java, Python, and cloud technologies. Gain experience in enterprise software development and digital transformation projects.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Work with Infosys data science team on machine learning projects, predictive analytics, and big data solutions. Use Python, R, and advanced ML libraries to solve real-world business problems.

title: Web Development Intern
description: Develop modern web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Work on responsive design, API development, and full-stack solutions for enterprise clients.

title: AI/ML Intern
description: Work on artificial intelligence and machine learning projects including computer vision, NLP, and deep learning applications. Use TensorFlow, PyTorch, and cloud ML services.

title: Cybersecurity Intern
description: Learn cybersecurity fundamentals, ethical hacking, network security, and threat analysis. Work on security assessments, vulnerability testing, and security tool development.

title: Cloud Computing Intern
description: Work with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Learn cloud architecture, DevOps practices, containerization, and serverless computing.

title: Mobile App Development Intern
description: Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using React Native, Flutter, and native development. Work on cross-platform solutions and mobile UI/UX design.

title: DevOps Intern
description: Learn DevOps practices including CI/CD, infrastructure as code, monitoring, and automation. Work with Jenkins, GitLab, Docker, and cloud deployment strategies.

title: Data Analytics Intern
description: Work on data analytics projects using SQL, Python, and business intelligence tools. Learn data visualization, statistical analysis, and business reporting.

title: Blockchain Intern
description: Learn blockchain technology, smart contracts, and decentralized applications. Work on Ethereum, Hyperledger, and blockchain security implementations.

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Design user interfaces and user experiences for web and mobile applications. Work with Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and design systems.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Learn digital marketing strategies, SEO, social media marketing, and content creation. Work on campaigns, analytics, and growth marketing initiatives.

title: IoT Intern
description: Work on Internet of Things projects including sensor networks, embedded systems, and IoT platforms. Learn Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and IoT protocols.

title: Game Development Intern
description: Develop mobile and web games using Unity, Unreal Engine, and game development frameworks. Work on game mechanics, graphics, and user experience.

title: AR/VR Intern
description: Work on Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality applications using Unity, ARCore, ARKit, and VR development tools. Create immersive experiences and 3D applications.

title: Fintech Intern
description: Work on financial technology solutions including payment systems, digital banking, and fintech applications. Learn about financial regulations and fintech innovations.

title: E-commerce Intern
description: Work on e-commerce platforms, online marketplaces, and digital commerce solutions. Learn about e-commerce architecture, payment processing, and customer experience.

title: Healthcare Tech Intern
description: Work on healthcare technology solutions including telemedicine, health records, and medical applications. Learn about healthcare regulations and medical software development.

title: EdTech Intern
description: Work on educational technology platforms, learning management systems, and educational content delivery. Learn about online education and learning analytics.

title: AgriTech Intern
description: Work on agricultural technology solutions including farm management, supply chain, and agricultural data analytics. Learn about precision agriculture and IoT in farming.
